// Async/await example
async function fetchUser(userId) {
  try {
    const response = await fetch(`/api/users/${userId}`);
    if (!response.ok) {
      throw new Error('User not found');
    }
    const user = await response.json();
    return user;
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Failed to fetch user:', error);
    return null;
  }
}
